alert.note: Alert for Barnstable (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 13 at 3:14AM EDT until March 15 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 2 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Barnstable County. * WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 2 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Risk for power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak of the winds expected Tuesday late afternoon through the night.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
